attributes.action: To employ an ex-serviceman as Defence Minister (Someone who will get the job done and understands requirements in the forces)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have a a dire set of Defence Ministers under Labour - Geoff Hoon (lack of equipment and interest) Hutton (resigned when going got tough) and now Bob ******** Ainsworth (fitted for but not with) Surely we require a man of substance for this position
